statements: SELECT user_id, location_name, timestamp, behavior_event FROM UserLocationBehavior;
SELECT behavior_event, user_id, location_name, timestamp FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE location_name = 'Home';
SELECT * FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE behavior_event = 'Click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE behavior_event = 'View';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, location_name, behavior_event FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) as frequency FROM UserLocationBehavior GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(MAX(timestamp), MIN(timestamp))) as avg_days_between_activities FROM UserLocationBehavior;
SELECT user_id, location_name, COUNT(*) as total_behavior_events FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE behavior_event = 'purchase' GROUP BY user_id, location_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT location_name) as unique_locations_visited FROM UserLocationBehavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT location_name) > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM user_profile;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM location_behavior GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'M' OR gender = 'F';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM location_behavior;
SELECT user_id, username, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM user_profile GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, location, timestamp FROM LocationHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_description FROM SuspiciousBehavior WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior JOIN SuspiciousBehavior ON UserBehavior.user_id = SuspiciousBehavior.user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, location, timestamp FROM LocationHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, behavior_description FROM SuspiciousBehavior WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM UserBehavior GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM UserLocationBehavior ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, location FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_type, last_used FROM UserDevice WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' OR device_type = 'Tablet';
SELECT user_id, location, time FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM UserActivity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM UserSession WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserDevice WHERE device_type = 'mobile' AND last_used < '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, device_id, device_type, last_used FROM UserDevice WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY last_used ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior;
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_pattern FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_timestamp FROM BehaviorLogs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE latitude > 40.0 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT behavior_description, log_timestamp FROM BehaviorLogs WHERE user_id = 2 AND location_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, access_level, last_login FROM UserAccess WHERE login_attempts > 3 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, behavior_pattern FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_pattern LIKE '%positive%' AND location = 'New York';
